    • Uses of LineSegment3DReadOnly in us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces

      Subinterfaces of LineSegment3DReadOnly in us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      interface  LineSegment3DBasics
      Write and read interface for a line segment 3D.
      Methods in us.ihmc.euclid.geometry.interfaces with parameters of type LineSegment3DReadOnly 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default double LineSegment3DReadOnly.distance​(LineSegment3DReadOnly otherLineSegment)
      This methods computes the minimum distance between this line segment and the given one.
      default double LineSegment3DReadOnly.dotProduct​(LineSegment3DReadOnly other)
      Computes the dot product of this line segment with the other line segment such that:
      this · other = Math.cos(α) * this.length() * other.length()
      where α is the angle from this to the other line segment.
      default boolean LineSegment3DReadOnly.epsilonEquals​(LineSegment3DReadOnly other, double epsilon)
      Tests on a per-component basis on both endpoints if this line segment is equal to other with the tolerance epsilon.
      default boolean LineSegment3DReadOnly.equals​(LineSegment3DReadOnly other)
      Tests on a per component basis, if this line segment 3D is exactly equal to other.
      default boolean LineSegment3DReadOnly.geometricallyEquals​(LineSegment3DReadOnly other, double epsilon)
      Compares this to other to determine if the two line segments are geometrically similar.
      default void Line2DBasics.set​(LineSegment3DReadOnly lineSegment3DReadOnly)
      Sets this line to go through the endpoints of the given line segment projected on the XY-plane.
      default void Line3DBasics.set​(LineSegment3DReadOnly lineSegment3DReadOnly)
      Sets this line to go through the endpoints of the given line segment.
      default void LineSegment2DBasics.set​(LineSegment3DReadOnly other)
      Sets this line segment to be same as the given line segment.
      default void LineSegment3DBasics.set​(LineSegment3DReadOnly other)
      Sets this line segment to be same as the given line segment.
